Address.label: Address
Address.value: 131 CLARENDON STREET, BOSTON, Massachusetts, 02116, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Brookline Bancorp Inc operates as a multi-bank holding company. Brookline is a commercially-focused financial institution with approximately 50 full-service banking offices throughout greater Boston, the north shore of Massachusetts, and Rhode Island. It offers commercial, business and retail banking services, including a full complement of cash management products, online banking services, consumer and residential loans.
